sn22.82:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ.
sn22.82:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṃghaparivuto ajjhokāse nisinno hoti.
sn22.82:5.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.82:5.2: “puccheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ kiñcideva desaṃ, sace me bhagavā okāsaṃ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti?
sn22.82:5.3: “Tena hi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, sake āsane nisīditvā puccha yadākaṅkhasī”ti.
sn22.82:5.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissutvā sake āsane nisīditvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.82:6.5: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṃ uttariṃ pañhaṃ apucchi:
sn22.82:7.3: taññeva nu kho, bhante, upādānaṃ te pañcupādānakkhandhā udāhu aññatra pañcahi upādānakkhandhehi upādānan”ti?
sn22.82:7.4: “Na kho, bhikkhu, taññeva upādānaṃ te pañcupādānakkhandhā nāpi aññatra pañcahi upādānakkhandhehi upādānaṃ, api ca yo tattha chandarāgo taṃ tattha upādānan”ti.
sn22.82:8.4: ‘evaṃrūpo siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃvedano siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃsañño siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃsaṅkhāro siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānaṃ, evaṃviññāṇo siyaṃ anāgatamaddhānan’ti.
sn22.82:8.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, siyā pañcupādānakkhandhesu chandarāgavemattatā”ti?
sn22.82:9.2: “Yaṃ kiñci, bhikkhu, rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, ayaṃ vuccati rūpakkhandho.
sn22.82:9.6: yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, ayaṃ vuccati viññāṇakkhandho.
sn22.82:10.1: “Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāya;
sn22.82:10.2: ko hetu ko paccayo vedanākkhandhassa paññāpanāya;
sn22.82:10.3: ko hetu ko paccayo saññākkhandhassa paññāpanāya;
sn22.82:10.4: ko hetu ko paccayo saṅkhārakkhandhassa paññāpanāya;
sn22.82:10.5: ko hetu ko paccayo viññāṇakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā”ti?
sn22.82:10.6: “Cattāro kho, bhikkhu, mahābhūtā hetu, cattāro mahābhūtā paccayo rūpakkhandhassa paññāpanāya.
sn22.82:10.7: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo vedanākkhandhassa paññāpanāya.
sn22.82:10.8: Phasso hetu phasso paccayo saññākkhandhassa paññāpanāya.
sn22.82:10.9: Phasso hetu, phasso paccayo saṅkhārakkhandhassa paññāpanāya.
sn22.82:10.10: Nāmarūpaṃ hetu, nāmarūpaṃ paccayo viññāṇakkhandhassa paññāpanāyā”ti.
sn22.82:11.2: “Idha, bhikkhu, assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.82:11.3: attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.82:11.9: attani vā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.82:12.2: “Idha, bhikkhu, sutavā ariyasāvako ariyānaṃ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme suvinīto, sappurisānaṃ dassāvī sappurisadhammassa kovido sappurisadhamme suvinīto na rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.82:12.3: na attani vā rūpaṃ, na rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.82:12.7: na viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, na viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ;
sn22.82:12.8: na attani vā viññāṇaṃ, na viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn22.82:12.9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hotī”ti.
sn22.82:13.1: “Ko nu kho, bhante, rūpassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇaṃ;
sn22.82:13.5: ko viññāṇassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn22.82:13.6: “Yaṃ kho, bhikkhu, rūpaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ—
sn22.82:13.15: yaṃ viññāṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ—
sn22.82:13.21: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṃ uttariṃ pañhaṃ apucchi:
sn22.82:14.1: “Kathaṃ nu kho, bhante, jānato, kathaṃ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti?
sn22.82:14.2: “Yaṃ kiñci, bhikkhu, rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, sabbaṃ rūpaṃ:
sn22.82:14.3: ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passati.
sn22.82:14.7: yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ:
sn22.82:14.8: ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passati.
sn22.82:14.9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṃ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na hontī”ti.
sn22.82:15.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn22.82:15.6: anattakatāni kammāni kathamattānaṃ phusissantī”ti.
sn22.82:15.7: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā ceto parivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn22.82:16.1: “Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, bhikkhave, vijjati yaṃ idhekacco moghapuriso avidvā avijjāgato taṇhādhipateyyena cetasā satthusāsanaṃ atidhāvitabbaṃ maññeyya.
sn22.82:16.7: Paṭipucchāvinītā kho me tumhe, bhikkhave, tatra tatra tesu tesu dhammesu.
sn22.82:17.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.82:17.8: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.82:17.10: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
